alert.note: Alert for Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 19 at 3:01PM MDT until July 21 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 8 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...High temperatures of 93 to 107 expected across the L-C Valley. * WHERE...Gifford, Alpowa Summit, Clarkston, Lewiston Grade, Lewiston, Peck, Culdesac, Lapwai, and Pomeroy. * WHEN...From Noon Thursday to 8 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...People acclimated to heat are also susceptible to heat related illness. Everyone should take precaution to avoid heat related illness.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
